text: @realDonaldTrump @NYCMayor Nice Try!  You don't want to talk about the Coronavirus Pandemic that is Ravaging America! You are AWOL! There is No Leadership in the White House! You choose Racism over good Patriotic Americans. You sell our Military soldier's lives for your Bank account. You are a Traitor!!!
